feed.title: Crafting Supply Hub
feed.subtitle: Welcome to Crafting Supply Hub , your go-to guide for Canadian crafting supplies, budget-friendly DIYs, and wholesale sourcing tips.

entry.title: Spotlight: Canadian-Made Craft Supplies
entry.content: Discover the best Canadian-made craft supplies and support local makers! For a full list of Canadian-made materials, visit the Canadian-Made Materials page.
entry.summary: Discover the best Canadian-made craft supplies and support local makers! For a full list of Canadian-made materials, visit the Canadian-Made Materials page.

entry.title: Welcome to Crafting Supply Hub
entry.content:
Welcome to Crafting Supply Hub! This blog will help Canadian crafters find the best supplies and tools.

Stay tuned for tips, calculators, and product recommendations!
entry.summary: Welcome to Crafting Supply Hub! This blog will help Canadian crafters find the best supplies and tools.
